room.name: Bexley
room.description: FLASH! A blinding light fills your entire field of vision. For a few seconds, everything goes dark. As you start to come to, you realize that this place looks familiar! You find yourself at the edge of the Kenyon College campus, right outside of Bexley Hall. There's only a crecent moon tonight, so you don't see much. You see a flashlight lying on the ground. You can only go south.

room.name: MiddlePathEaton
room.description: As you walk, the ground shifts under your feet, but this isn't an earthquake. It's just the really loose gravel on Middle Path. Suddenly, you hit a soft spot in the ground. You look, and there's a box with a CPU chip and a bottle of rum. You are on a north/south path.

trigger.print: After a few sips of the rum that you found, you start to feel...warmer.

room.name: MiddlePathMcBride
room.description: Out of the darkness, a golf cart pulls up next to you. You are on a north/south path.

trigger.print: Drinking rum in front of that campo officer doesn't seem like a good idea to me...but you proceed anyways...

room.name: MiddlePathWiggins
room.description: You are at the four way intersection of Middle Path and Wiggins Street.

trigger.print: The campo officer has been patient with you, but your continued ignorance has landed you in a pair of handcuffs. You lose.

room.name: WigginsEast
room.description: You're playing with fire here. Want to keep going?

trigger.print: Why would you try and walk in the street? The deputy sheriff saw you and instituted his "street justice" policy, which means he ran you over. You lose. (See Kenyon Collegiate, 2018, issue 11.2 for the street justice policy.)

room.name: WigginsWest
room.description: You're playing with fire here. Want to keep going?

trigger.print: Why would you try and walk in the street? The deputy sheriff saw you and instituted his "street justice" policy, which means he ran you over. You lose. (See Kenyon Collegiate, 2018, issue 11.2 for the street justice policy.)

room.name: MiddlePathAscension
room.description: You've been walking for a few minutes, and you find Ascension Hall to the east. Through the fog, you can see a building to the front. You are at a three-way intersection: north/south and a separate path to the east.

room.name: OldKenyon
room.description: As the fog clears, you see the outline of a grand building. The ground rumbles as an Old Kenyon house party goes down. There's a figure standing in the nighttime mist. You can only go north.

attack.print: You shine the flashlight in their face and they scuttle away. They dropped something...looks like a key to me.

room.name: PeirceEntrance
room.description: You reach a strange building. Above the door, you see "Peirce Hall" engraved in the brick. You are on a east/west path.
room.print: The door clicks and starts to creak open.

room.name: mdf
room.description: You push a mysterious door, and inside, there's an old and dusty IBM z/370 mainframe computer. All of the lights are dark, and the fans appear to be still. You can only go west from here.

turnon.print: The mainframe springs to life, the lights start flashing in a seemingly organized fashion, and the fans start up.
